# Fascinante Digital

> Fascinante Digital is a digital agency providing comprehensive web development, SEO, and digital marketing services. Our platform offers tools for website audits, analytics, and business growth optimization.

## Main Pages

- [Home](https://fascinantedigital.com/): Main landing page with company overview and services
- [Audit](https://fascinantedigital.com/audit): Free website audit tool for digital analysis
- [Blog](https://fascinantedigital.com/blog): Articles about digital marketing, SEO, and web development
- [Contact](https://fascinantedigital.com/contact): Contact form and business information
- [Features](https://fascinantedigital.com/features): Detailed overview of our services and capabilities

## Services

- **Website Audits**: Comprehensive digital analysis and SEO evaluation
- **Web Development**: Modern web applications using Next.js, React, and TypeScript
- **Digital Marketing**: SEO optimization and online presence management
- **Business Analytics**: Data-driven insights for business growth

## Technical Stack

- **Frontend**: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript
- **UI Libraries**: Preline UI, shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS 4
- **Internationalization**: next-intl (supports Spanish and English)
- **Backend**: Serverless functions and API routes
- **Database**: Supabase
- **Payments**: Stripe integration

## Documentation

- **Sitemap**: Available at `/sitemap.xml`
- **Blog Content**: Markdown-based articles with MDX support
- **API Documentation**: Available for integrations

## Languages

The website supports multiple languages:
- Spanish (es) - Default
- English (en)

## Contact

- **Email**: info@fascinantedigital.com
- **Application**: https://app.fascinantedigital.com/
